trans-unit.target: 要设置单元格属性的值，请使用 gtk_cell_area_cell_set_property() ， gtk_cell_area_cell_set() 或 gtk_cell_area_cell_set_valist() 。要获取单元格属性的值，请使用 gtk_cell_area_cell_get_property() ， gtk_cell_area_cell_get() 或 gtk_cell_area_cell_get_valist() 。

trans-unit.source: To set this up, we add two labels to the header bar in our window template, named lines_label and lines, and bind them to struct members in the private struct, as we’ve seen a couple of times by now.
trans-unit.target: 要进行设置，我们在窗口模板的标题栏中添加了两个标签，名为 lines_label 和 lines ，并将它们绑定到私有结构中的结构成员上，这已经有好几次了。

trans-unit.source: To set up a drag icon and associate it with an ongoing drag operation, use gtk_drag_icon_get_for_drag() to get the icon for a drag. You can then use it like any other widget and use gtk_drag_icon_set_child() to set whatever widget should be used for the drag icon.
trans-unit.target: 要设置拖动图标并将其与正在进行的拖动操作相关联，请使用 gtk_drag_icon_get_for_drag() 获取用于拖动的图标。然后，您可以像使用任何其他小部件一样使用它，并使用 gtk_drag_icon_set_child() 设置应将任何小部件用于拖动图标。

trans-unit.source: To simplify dealing with the variability between these input devices, GTK has a concept of logical and physical devices. The concrete physical devices that have many different characteristics (mice may have 2 or 3 or 8 buttons, keyboards have different layouts and may or may not have a separate number block, etc) are represented as physical devices. Each physical device is associated with a virtual logical device. Logical devices always come in pointer/keyboard pairs - you can think of such a pair as a “seat”.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化处理这些输入设备之间的可变性，GTK具有逻辑和物理设备的概念。具有许多不同特性的具体物理设备（鼠标可能具有2个或3个或8个按钮，键盘具有不同的布局，并且可能具有也可能没有单独的数字块等）被表示为物理设备。每个物理设备都与一个虚拟逻辑设备关联。逻辑设备始终以指针/键盘对的形式出现-您可以将这样的一对视为“座位”。

trans-unit.source: To simply switch the state of a toggle button, use gtk_toggle_button_toggled().
trans-unit.target: 要简单地切换切换按钮的状态，请使用 gtk_toggle_button_toggled() 。

trans-unit.source: To specify a person with an email address, use a string like "Edgar Allan Poe <edgar@poe.com>". To specify a website with a title, use a string like "GTK team http://www.gtk.org".
trans-unit.target: 要指定具有电子邮件地址的人，请使用“ Edgar Allan Poe <edgar@poe.com>”之类的字符串。要指定带有标题的网站，请使用“ GTK team http://www.gtk.org”之类的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To start the animation in a cell, set the “active” property to TRUE and increment the “pulse” property at regular intervals. The usual way to set the cell renderer properties for each cell is to bind them to columns in your tree model using e.g. gtk_tree_view_column_add_attribute().
trans-unit.target: 要在单元格中开始动画，请将“ active”属性设置为 TRUE ,并以固定间隔增加“ pulse”属性。设置每个单元格的单元格渲染器属性的常用方法是使用 gtk_tree_view_column_add_attribute() 将它们绑定到树模型中的列。

trans-unit.source: To start the animation, use gtk_spinner_start(), to stop it use gtk_spinner_stop().
trans-unit.target: 要启动动画，请使用 gtk_spinner_start() ，要停止动画，请使用 gtk_spinner_stop() 。

trans-unit.source: To summarize, make sure you use a predefined response code when you use GtkFileChooserDialog to ensure proper operation.
trans-unit.target: 总而言之，请确保在使用GtkFileChooserDialog时使用预定义的响应代码以确保正确的操作。

trans-unit.source: To support the tree view, GtkCellRendererPixbuf also supports rendering two alternative pixbufs, when the “is-expander” property is TRUE. If the “is-expanded” property is TRUE and the “pixbuf-expander-open” property is set to a pixbuf, it renders that pixbuf, if the “is-expanded” property is FALSE and the “pixbuf-expander-closed” property is set to a pixbuf, it renders that one.
trans-unit.target: 为了支持树视图，当“ is-expander”属性为 TRUE 时，GtkCellRendererPixbuf还支持渲染两个备用pixbuf 。如果“ is-expanded”属性为 TRUE 且“ pixbuf-expander-open”属性设置为pixbuf，则如果“ is-expanded”属性为 FALSE 且“ pixbuf-expander-closed”，则渲染该pixbuf。属性设置为pixbuf，它将渲染该像素。

trans-unit.source: To this end, we add a member to the struct of our application window subclass and keep a reference to the GtkStack there. The first member of the struct should be the parent type from which the class is derived. Here, ExampleAppWindow is derived from GtkApplicationWindow. The gtk_widget_class_bind_template_child() function arranges things so that after instantiating the template, the stack member of the struct will point to the widget of the same name from the template.
trans-unit.target: 为此，我们将一个成员添加到应用程序窗口子类的结构中，并在那里保留对GtkStack的引用。结构的第一个成员应该是派生该类的父类型。在这里，ExampleAppWindow是从GtkApplicationWindow派生的。该 gtk_widget_class_bind_template_child() 函数整理东西，所以，在实例化模板后，该 stack 该结构的成员将指向从模板名称相同的部件。

trans-unit.source: To track changes in the selected application, use the “changed” signal.
trans-unit.target: 要跟踪所选应用程序中的更改，请使用“已更改”信号。

trans-unit.source: To track errors while loading CSS, connect to the “parsing-error” signal.
trans-unit.target: 要在加载CSS时跟踪错误，请连接到“ parsing-error”信号。

trans-unit.source: To unset an error, the stream must be reset via a call to gtk_media_stream_unprepared().
trans-unit.target: 要 gtk_media_stream_unprepared() 错误，必须通过调用gtk_media_stream_unprepared（）来重置流。

trans-unit.source: To use a GtkDropTargetAsync to receive drops on a widget, you create a GtkDropTargetAsync object, configure which data formats and actions you support, connect to its signals, and then attach it to the widget with gtk_widget_add_controller().
trans-unit.target: 要使用GtkDropTargetAsync接收小部件上的放置，请创建GtkDropTargetAsync对象，配置支持的数据格式和操作，连接其信号，然后使用 gtk_widget_add_controller() 将其附加到小部件上。

trans-unit.source: Toggles line wrapping within the GtkLabel widget. TRUE makes it break lines if text exceeds the widget’s size. FALSE lets the text get cut off by the edge of the widget if it exceeds the widget size.
trans-unit.target: 切换GtkLabel小部件内的换行。如果文本超过窗口小部件的大小，则 TRUE 会使其折行。 FALSE 文本超出窗口小部件的大小，则FALSE允许文本被窗口小部件的边缘截断。

trans-unit.source: Try to lookup a GType via the given function name, specified explicitly in a GtkBuilder file, like via the "type-func" attribute in the "<object>" tag. This function is very rarely used. The C implementation will use dlsym() and call the resulting function as a GTypeFunc. The default implementation will fail and just return G_TYPE_INVALID.
trans-unit.target: 尝试通过给定的函数名称（在GtkBuilder文件中显式指定）查找GType，例如通过“ <object>”标记中的“ type-func”属性查找。此功能很少使用。C实现将使用 dlsym() 并将生成的函数作为GTypeFunc调用。默认实现将失败，仅返回 G_TYPE_INVALID 。

trans-unit.source: Try to lookup a GType via the its name. See gtk_builder_get_type_from_name() for more details. The C implementation will use g_type_from_name() and if that fails try to guess the correct function name for registering the type and then use dlsym() to load it. The default implementation just tries g_type_from_name() and otherwise fails.
trans-unit.target: 尝试通过其名称查找GType。有关更多详细信息，请参见 gtk_builder_get_type_from_name() 。C实现将使用 g_type_from_name() ，如果失败，则尝试猜测用于注册类型的正确函数名，然后使用 dlsym() 加载它。默认实现只是尝试 g_type_from_name() ，否则会失败。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the specific kind of object represented by an <object> element is specified by the “class” attribute. If the type has not been loaded yet, GTK tries to find the get_type() function from the class name by applying heuristics. This works in most cases, but if necessary, it is possible to specify the name of the get_type() function explicitly with the "type-func" attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通常，由 <object> 元素表示的特定类型的对象由“ class”属性指定。如果尚未加载类型，则GTK会通过应用启发式方法尝试从类名称中找到 get_type() 函数。在大多数情况下，这是可行的，但如有必要，可以使用“ type-func”属性显式指定 get_type() 函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last undoable action on the buffer, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 撤销缓冲区上最后一个可撤销的操作(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the setup done by gtk_editable_init_delegate().
trans-unit.target: 撤消 gtk_editable_init_delegate() 完成的设置。

trans-unit.source: Unicode characters
trans-unit.target: 统一码字符

trans-unit.source: Unknown failure.
trans-unit.target: 不明故障。

trans-unit.source: Unless “hscrollbar-policy” and “vscrollbar-policy” are GTK_POLICY_NEVER or GTK_POLICY_EXTERNAL, GtkScrolledWindow adds internal GtkScrollbar widgets around its child. The scroll position of the child, and if applicable the scrollbars, is controlled by the “hadjustment” and “vadjustment” that are associated with the GtkScrolledWindow. See the docs on GtkScrollbar for the details, but note that the “step_increment” and “page_increment” fields are only effective if the policy causes scrollbars to be present.
trans-unit.target: 除非“ hscrollbar-policy”和“ vscrollbar-policy”是GTK_POLICY_NEVER或GTK_POLICY_EXTERNAL，否则GtkScrolledWindow会在其子级周围添加内部GtkScrollbar小部件。子项的滚动位置以及滚动条（如果适用）由与GtkScrolledWindow关联的“调整”和“调整”控制。有关详细信息，请参阅GtkScrollbar上的文档，但请注意，只有在策略导致存在滚动条的情况下，“ step_increment”和“ page_increment”字段才有效。

trans-unit.source: Unless an expression is set on self , the sorter will always compare items as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 除非将表达式设置为 self ，否则排序器将始终将项目比较为无效。

trans-unit.source: Unless an expression is set on it, this sorter will always compare items as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 除非对其设置了表达式,否则该分拣器将始终将项目作为无效项目进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Unless set to a different value, this will be the value of the “gtk-icon-theme-name” property of the GtkSettings object associated to the display of the icontheme object.
trans-unit.target: 除非设置为其他值，否则它将是与icontheme对象的显示相关联的GtkSettings对象的“ gtk-icon-theme-name”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike GtkCssParserErrors, warnings do not cause the parser to skip any input, but they indicate issues that should be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 与GtkCssParserErrors不同，警告不会导致解析器跳过任何输入，但是警告指示应解决的问题。

trans-unit.source: Unlike gtk_widget_set_size_request(), which sets a size request for a widget and thus would keep users from shrinking the window, this function only sets the initial size, just as if the user had resized the window themselves. Users can still shrink the window again as they normally would. Setting a default size of -1 means to use the “natural” default size (the size request of the window).
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_widget_set_size_request() 设置窗口小部件的尺寸请求并因此避免用户缩小窗口的方法不同，此函数仅设置初始尺寸，就好像用户自己调整了窗口的大小一样。用户仍然可以像往常一样再次缩小窗口。将默认大小设置为-1意味着使用“自然”默认大小（窗口的大小请求）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a GtkWidget, a GtkConstraintGuide will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 与GtkWidget不同，将不会绘制GtkConstraintGuide。

trans-unit.source: Unlike regular interface descriptions, gtk_widget_class_set_template() will expect a <template> tag as a direct child of the toplevel <interface> tag. The <template> tag must specify the “class” attribute which must be the type name of the widget. Optionally, the “parent” attribute may be specified to specify the direct parent type of the widget type, this is ignored by the GtkBuilder but required for Glade to introspect what kind of properties and internal children exist for a given type when the actual type does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 与常规接口描述不同， gtk_widget_class_set_template() 将期望<template>标记作为顶级<interface>标记的直接子代。<template>标签必须指定“ class”属性，该属性必须是小部件的类型名称。可选地，可以指定“ parent”属性来指定小部件类型的直接父类型，GtkBuilder会忽略该属性，但是当实际类型确实存在时，Glade会要求其反思给定类型存在哪些类型的属性和内部子级不存在。

trans-unit.source: Unlike roles, attributes may change over time, or in response to user action; for instance:
trans-unit.target: 与角色不同,属性可能会随着时间的推移而改变,或者根据用户的操作而改变;例如。

trans-unit.source: Unlike traditional menus, those created from menu models don’t have keyboard accelerators associated with menu items. Instead, GtkApplication offers the gtk_application_set_accels_for_action() API to associate keyboard shortcuts with actions.
trans-unit.target: 与传统菜单不同，从菜单模型创建的菜单没有与菜单项关联的键盘加速器。相反，GtkApplication提供了 gtk_application_set_accels_for_action() API，以将键盘快捷键与动作相关联。

trans-unit.source: Unrealized widgets do not have a frame clock.
trans-unit.target: 未实现的小部件没有框架时钟。

trans-unit.source: Unrealizes a GtkNative.
trans-unit.target: 未实现GtkNative。

trans-unit.source: Unselect all children of box , if the selection mode allows it.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式允许，则取消选择 box 的所有子项。

trans-unit.source: Unselects a range of nodes, determined by start_path and end_path inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择由 start_path 和 end_path (包括端值）确定的节点范围。

trans-unit.source: Unselects a single child of box , if the selection mode allows it.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式允许，则取消选择 box 的单个子项。

trans-unit.source: Unselects a single row of box , if the selection mode allows it.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式允许，则取消选择 box 的单行。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all the icons.
trans-unit.target: 解除对所有图标的选择。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 解除对所有节点的选择。

trans-unit.source: Unselects the row at path .
trans-unit.target: 取消选择 path 上的行。

trans-unit.source: Unselects the specified iterator.
trans-unit.target: 解除对指定迭代器的选择。

trans-unit.source: Unsets all the mappings on all renderers on cell_layout and removes all renderers from cell_layout .
trans-unit.target: 会取消所有对所有渲染映射 cell_layout 和删除所有渲染 cell_layout 。

trans-unit.source: Unsets all the mappings on all renderers on cell_layout and removes all renderers from cell_layout.
trans-unit.target: 解除cell_layout上所有渲染器的所有映射,并从cell_layout中删除所有渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Unsets all the mappings on all renderers on the tree_column .
trans-unit.target: 会取消所有上的所有渲染映射 tree_column 。

trans-unit.source: Unsets the invisible char previously set with gtk_entry_set_invisible_char(). So that the default invisible char is used again.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置先前用 gtk_entry_set_invisible_char() 设置的不可见字符。这样就可以再次使用默认的不可见字符。

trans-unit.source: Unsets the invisible char previously set with gtk_text_set_invisible_char(). So that the default invisible char is used again.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置先前用 gtk_text_set_invisible_char() 设置的不可见字符。这样就可以再次使用默认的不可见字符。

trans-unit.source: Unsets the placement of the contents with respect to the scrollbars for the scrolled window. If no window placement is set for a scrolled window, it defaults to GTK_CORNER_TOP_LEFT.
trans-unit.target: 相对于滚动窗口的滚动条取消内容的放置。如果没有为滚动窗口设置窗口放置，则默认为 GTK_CORNER_TOP_LEFT 。

trans-unit.source: Until the first call to gtk_snapshot_pop(), the bottom image for the blend operation will be recorded. After that call, the top image to be blended will be recorded until the second call to gtk_snapshot_pop().
trans-unit.target: 在第一次调用 gtk_snapshot_pop() 之前，将记录混合操作的底部图像。在该调用之后，将记录要混合的顶部图像，直到第二次调用 gtk_snapshot_pop() 为止。

trans-unit.source: Until the first call to gtk_snapshot_pop(), the start image will be snapshot. After that call, the end image will be recorded until the second call to gtk_snapshot_pop().
trans-unit.target: 在第一次调用 gtk_snapshot_pop() 之前，起始映像将是快照。在该调用之后，将记录结束图像，直到第二次调用 gtk_snapshot_pop() 为止。

trans-unit.source: Unused
trans-unit.target: Unused

trans-unit.source: Unused.
trans-unit.target: Unused.

trans-unit.source: Update
trans-unit.target: Update

trans-unit.source: Update the filtering for all rows. Call this when result of the filter function on the box is changed due to an external factor. For instance, this would be used if the filter function just looked for a specific search string and the entry with the search string has changed.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有行的过滤。当 box 上的过滤器功能的结果由于外部因素而改变时，请调用此函数。例如，如果过滤器功能只是在寻找特定的搜索字符串并且包含搜索字符串的条目已更改，则将使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Update the separators for all rows. Call this when result of the header function on the box is changed due to an external factor.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有行的分隔符。当 box 上的标头函数的结果由于外部因素而改变时，请调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Update the sorting for all rows. Call this when result of the sort function on the box is changed due to an external factor.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有行的排序。当 box 上的排序功能的结果由于外部因素而改变时，调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Update to GtkFileChooser API changes
trans-unit.target: GtkFileChooser API更新

trans-unit.source: Updates a list of accessible properties. See the GtkAccessibleProperty documentation for the value types of accessible properties.
trans-unit.target: 更新可访问属性的列表。有关可访问属性的值类型，请参见GtkAccessibleProperty文档。

trans-unit.source: Updates a list of accessible relations.
trans-unit.target: 更新可访问关系的列表。

trans-unit.source: Updates a list of accessible states. See the GtkAccessibleState documentation for the value types of accessible states.
trans-unit.target: 更新可访问状态的列表。有关可访问状态的值类型，请参见GtkAccessibleState文档。

trans-unit.source: Updates an array of accessible properties.
trans-unit.target: 更新一系列可访问属性。

trans-unit.source: Updates an array of accessible relations.
trans-unit.target: 更新一系列的可访问关系。

trans-unit.source: Updates an array of accessible states.
trans-unit.target: 更新一系列的可访问状态。

trans-unit.source: Updates the “value” property to ensure that the range between lower and upper is in the current page (i.e. between “value” and “value” + “page-size”). If the range is larger than the page size, then only the start of it will be in the current page.
trans-unit.target: 更新“ value”属性，以确保“ lower ”和“ upper ”之间的范围在当前页面中（即“ value”和“ value” + “ page-size”之间）。如果范围大于页面大小，则仅其开头将在当前页面中。

trans-unit.source: Updates the filtering for all children.
trans-unit.target: 更新对所有孩子的过滤。

trans-unit.source: Updates the position of a child, as for gtk_text_view_add_overlay().
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_view_add_overlay() 一样，更新子位置。

trans-unit.source: Updates the sorting for all children.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有孩子的排序。

trans-unit.source: Upon errors 0 will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR, G_MARKUP_ERROR or G_FILE_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误时，将返回0，并从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR，G_MARKUP_ERROR或G_FILE_ERROR域为 error 分配GError 。

trans-unit.source: Upon errors 0 will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR, G_MARKUP_ERROR or G_RESOURCE_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误时，将返回0，并从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR，G_MARKUP_ERROR或G_RESOURCE_ERROR域为 error 分配GError 。

trans-unit.source: Upon errors FALSE will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 出现错误时，将返回 FALSE ,并且将从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR域为 error 分配GError 。

trans-unit.source: Upon errors FALSE will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR or G_MARKUP_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误时，将返回 FALSE ,并且将从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR或G_MARKUP_ERROR域中为 error 分配GError 。

trans-unit.source: Upon errors FALSE will be returned and error will be assigned a GError from the GTK_BUILDER_ERROR, G_MARKUP_ERROR or G_VARIANT_PARSE_ERROR domain.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误时，将返回 FALSE 并将 error 从GTK_BUILDER_ERROR，G_MARKUP_ERROR或G_VARIANT_PARSE_ERROR域分配给GError 。

trans-unit.source: Use + instead of & when the keys may (or have to be) pressed sequentially (e.g use t+t for 'press the t key twice').
trans-unit.target: 当可以（或必须）连续按下键时，请使用+而不是＆（例如，将t + t用于“两次按下t键”）。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_print_operation_get_status() to obtain a status value that is suitable for programmatic use.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_print_operation_get_status() 获得适合编程使用的状态值。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_print_operation_set_use_full_page() and gtk_print_operation_set_unit() before starting the print operation to set up the transformation of the cairo context according to your needs.
trans-unit.target: 在开始打印操作之前，请使用 gtk_print_operation_set_use_full_page() 和 gtk_print_operation_set_unit() 来根据需要设置cairo上下文的转换。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_app_chooser_refresh() to bring the selection to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_app_chooser_refresh() 将选择恢复到初始状态。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_box_reorder_child_after() to move a child to a different place in the box.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_box_reorder_child_after() 将孩子移动到盒子中的其他位置。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_box_set_homogeneous() to specify whether or not all children of the GtkBox are forced to get the same amount of space.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_box_set_homogeneous() 来指定是否强制GtkBox的所有子级获得相同数量的空间。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_box_set_spacing() to determine how much space will be minimally placed between all children in the GtkBox. Note that spacing is added between the children.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_box_set_spacing() 确定GtkBox中所有子项之间的最小空间。请注意，在子级之间添加了间距。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_cell_area_class_install_cell_property() to install cell properties for a cell area class and gtk_cell_area_class_find_cell_property() or gtk_cell_area_class_list_cell_properties() to get information about existing cell properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_cell_area_class_install_cell_property() 安装单元区域类的单元属性，并使用 gtk_cell_area_class_find_cell_property() 或 gtk_cell_area_class_list_cell_properties() 获取有关现有单元属性的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_flow_box_selected_foreach() or gtk_flow_box_get_selected_children() to obtain the selected children.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_flow_box_selected_foreach() 或 gtk_flow_box_get_selected_children() 获取选定的子代。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_level_bar_set_value() to set the current value, and gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value() to set the value offsets at which the bar will be considered in a different state. GTK will add a few offsets by default on the level bar: GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_LOW, GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_HIGH and GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_FULL, with values 0.25, 0.75 and 1.0 respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_level_bar_set_value() 设置当前值，并使用 gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value() 设置将考虑在不同状态下的钢筋的值偏移量。GTK默认会在级别栏上添加一些偏移：GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_LOW，GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_HIGH和GTK_LEVEL_BAR_OFFSET_FULL，其值分别为0.25、0.75和1.0。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_print_job_get_surface() to obtain the cairo surface onto which the pages must be drawn. Use gtk_print_job_send() to send the finished job to the printer. If you don’t use cairo GtkPrintJob also supports printing of manually generated postscript, via gtk_print_job_set_source_file().
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_print_job_get_surface() 获得必须在其上绘制页面的开罗表面。使用 gtk_print_job_send() 将完成的作业发送到打印机。如果您不使用cairo，则GtkPrintJob还支持通过 gtk_print_job_set_source_file() 打印手动生成的后记。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_snapshot_scale_3d() to scale in all 3 dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_snapshot_scale_3d() 可以在所有3个维度上缩放。

trans-unit.source: Use gtk_widget_measure() if you want to support baseline alignment.
trans-unit.target: 如果要支持基线对齐，请使用 gtk_widget_measure() 。

trans-unit.source: Use pango_font_description_equal() if you want to compare two font descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果要比较两个字体说明，请使用 pango_font_description_equal() 。

trans-unit.source: Use NULL for tooltip to remove an existing tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 对 tooltip 使用 NULL 可以删除现有的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Use ADDRESS as the HTTP address, instead of the default http://127.0.0.1:PORT.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ADDRESS 作为HTTP地址，而不是默认的 http://127.0.0.1:PORT 。

trans-unit.source: Use ADDRESS as the unix domain socket address. This option overrides --address and --port. It is available only on Unix-like systems.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ADDRESS 作为Unix域套接字地址。此选项将覆盖 --address 和 --port 。它仅在类似Unix的系统上可用。

trans-unit.source: Use PORT as the HTTP port, instead of the default 8080 + (DISPLAY - 1).
trans-unit.target: 使用 PORT 作为HTTP端口，而不是默认的8080 +（ DISPLAY -1）。

trans-unit.source: Use GtkFixed instead of GtkLayout
trans-unit.target: 使用GtkFixed代替GtkLayout。

trans-unit.source: Use a GLES OpenGL context
trans-unit.target: 使用GLES OpenGL上下文

trans-unit.source: Use a legacy OpenGL context
trans-unit.target: 使用传统的OpenGL上下文

trans-unit.source: Use a staging buffer for Vulkan texture upload
trans-unit.target: 为Vulkan纹理上传使用暂存缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Use a staging image for Vulkan texture upload
trans-unit.target: 使用暂存图像进行Vulkan纹理上传。

trans-unit.source: Use repeated calls to gtk_box_append() to pack widgets into a GtkBox from start to end. Use gtk_box_remove() to remove widgets from the GtkBox. gtk_box_insert_child_after() can be used to add a child at a particular position.
trans-unit.target: 使用重复调用 gtk_box_append() 将小部件从头到尾打包到GtkBox中。使用 gtk_box_remove() 从GtkBox中删除小部件。 gtk_box_insert_child_after() 可用于在特定位置添加子项。

trans-unit.source: Use the OpenGL texture rectangle extension, if available
trans-unit.target: 使用OpenGL纹理矩形扩展(如有)。

trans-unit.source: Use the base GActionMap interface to add actions, to respond to the user selecting these menu items.
trans-unit.target: 使用基本的GActionMap接口来添加动作,以响应用户选择这些菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Use the new apis for keyboard shortcuts
trans-unit.target: 使用新的apis作为键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to avoid multiple emissions of the “changed” signal. See gtk_adjustment_set_lower() for an alternative way of compressing multiple emissions of “changed” into one.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能可以避免多次发射“变化的”信号。请参阅 gtk_adjustment_set_lower() ,以了解将“已更改”的多个发射压缩为一个的另一种方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to check if GTK has been initialized with gtk_init() or gtk_init_check().
trans-unit.target: 使用此函数检查GTK是否已使用 gtk_init() 或 gtk_init_check() 初始化。

trans-unit.source: Use this priority for functionality related to size allocation.
trans-unit.target: 将此优先级用于与尺寸分配相关的功能。

trans-unit.source: Use this when the information provided up to the current page is hereafter deemed permanent and cannot be modified or undone. For example, showing a progress page to track a long-running, unreversible operation after the user has clicked apply on a confirmation page.
trans-unit.target: 当提供到当前页面的信息此后被认为是永久性的,不能修改或撤销时,使用该功能。例如,在用户点击确认页面上的申请后,显示一个进度页面来跟踪一个长期运行的、不可逆转的操作。

trans-unit.source: Used as the label of the tab containing custom widgets. Note that this property may be ignored on some platforms.
trans-unit.target: 用作包含自定义小部件的标签页的标签。请注意,此属性在某些平台上可能被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Used for justifying the text inside a GtkLabel widget.
trans-unit.target: 用于对齐GtkLabel小部件内的文本。

trans-unit.source: Used for tasks that take a long time to complete, blocks the assistant until the page is marked as complete. Only the back button will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 用于需要长时间完成的任务,屏蔽助手,直到页面被标记为完成。只有后退按钮才会显示。

trans-unit.source: Used for when other page types are not appropriate. No buttons will be shown, and the application must add its own buttons through gtk_assistant_add_action_widget().
trans-unit.target: 用于其他页面类型不合适的情况。将不会显示任何按钮，并且应用程序必须通过 gtk_assistant_add_action_widget() 添加自己的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Used to control what selections users are allowed to make.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制用户可以进行哪些选择。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine the layout of pages on a sheet when printing multiple pages per sheet.
trans-unit.target: 当每张纸打印多页时,用于确定一张纸上的页面布局。

trans-unit.source: Used to get the GError quark for GtkFileChooser errors.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取GtkFileChooser错误的GError夸克。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate that the user has responded to the dialog in some way.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示用户已经以某种方式回应了对话框。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate the direction in which an arrow should point.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示箭头应该指向的方向。

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate which grid lines to draw in a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示在树状视图中绘制哪些网格线。

trans-unit.source: Used to keep track of whether the buffer has been modified since the last time it was saved. Whenever the buffer is saved to disk, call gtk_text_buffer_set_modified (buffer , FALSE). When the buffer is modified, it will automatically toggled on the modified bit again. When the modified bit flips, the buffer emits the “modified-changed” signal.
trans-unit.target: 用于跟踪缓冲区自上次保存以来是否已被修改。每当将缓冲区保存到磁盘时，请调用gtk_text_buffer_set_modified（ buffer ，FALSE）。修改缓冲区后，它将自动再次在修改后的位上切换。当修改后的位翻转时，缓冲器发出“修改后改变”的信号。

trans-unit.source: Using g_signal_connect(), the button is connected to a function in our app called print_hello(), so that when the button is clicked, GTK will call this function. As the print_hello() function does not use any data as input, NULL is passed to it. print_hello() calls g_print() with the string “Hello World” which will print Hello World in a terminal if the GTK application was started from one.
trans-unit.target: 使用 g_signal_connect() ，将按钮连接到我们应用程序中名为 print_hello() 的函数，以便在单击按钮时，GTK将调用此函数。由于 print_hello() 函数不使用任何数据作为输入，因此将NULL传递给它。 print_hello() 使用字符串“ Hello World”调用 g_print() ，如果GTK应用程序是从一个启动的，它将在终端上打印Hello World。

trans-unit.source: Usually allocation is performed only horizontally or sometimes vertically since a group of rows are usually rendered side by side vertically or horizontally and share either the same width or the same height. Sometimes they are allocated in both horizontal and vertical orientations producing a homogeneous effect of the rows. This is generally the case for GtkTreeView when “fixed-height-mode” is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 通常，分配只在水平或垂直方向执行，因为通常会垂直或水平地并排呈现一组行，并且它们共享相同的宽度或相同的高度。有时，它们在水平和垂直方向上均被分配，从而产生行的均匀效果。启用“固定高度模式”时，对于GtkTreeView通常是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Usually this function is used when the widget is located (or will be located) within the hierarchy of a GtkApplicationWindow.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当小部件位于（或将位于）GtkApplicationWindow的层次结构内时，将使用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Usually widgets will return NULL if the given coordinate is not contained in widget checked via gtk_widget_contains(). Otherwise they will recursively try to find a child that does not return NULL. Widgets are however free to customize their picking algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 通常小部件将返回 NULL 如果给定的坐标不包含 widget 通过检查 gtk_widget_contains() 。否则，它们将递归地尝试查找不返回 NULL 的子级。但是，小部件可以自由自定义其选择算法。

trans-unit.source: Various implementations of GtkListItemFactory exist to allow you different ways to provide those widgets. The most common implementations are GtkBuilderListItemFactory which takes a GtkBuilder .ui file and then creates widgets and manages everything automatically from the information in that file and GtkSignalListItemFactory which allows you to connect to signals with your own code and retain full control over how the widgets are setup and managed.
trans-unit.target: 存在GtkListItemFactory的各种实现，以允许您使用不同的方式来提供这些小部件。最常见的实现是GtkBuilderListItemFactory，它获取GtkBuilder .ui文件，然后创建窗口小部件并根据该文件中的信息自动管理所有内容；而GtkSignalListItemFactory则允许您使用自己的代码连接到信号，并完全控制窗口小部件的设置方式和管理。

trans-unit.source: Various methods for defining expressions exist, from simple constants via gtk_constant_expression_new() to looking up properties in a GObject (even recursively) via gtk_property_expression_new() or providing custom functions to transform and combine expressions via gtk_closure_expression_new().
trans-unit.target: 用于定义表达式存在多种方法，从简单的常数经由 gtk_constant_expression_new() 到在GObject的（甚至递归地）通过查找属性 gtk_property_expression_new() 或提供定制的函数来转换并组合表达式经由 gtk_closure_expression_new() 。

trans-unit.source: Views and listitems also support activation. Activation means that double clicking or pressing enter while inside a focused row will cause the view to emit and activation signal such as “activate”. This provides an easy way to set up lists, but can also be turned off on listitems if undesired.
trans-unit.target: 视图和列表项也支持激活。激活表示在焦点所在行内双击或按Enter会导致视图发出和激活信号，例如“ activate”。这提供了一种建立列表的简便方法，但是如果不需要，也可以在列表项上将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: Views display data from a model. A model is a GListModel and models can be provided in 3 ways or combinations thereof:
trans-unit.target: 视图显示来自模型的数据。模型是GListModel，可以通过3种方式或它们的组合来提供模型：

trans-unit.source: Views support selections via a selection model. A selection model is an implementation of the GtkSelectionModel interface on top of the GListModel interface that allows marking each item in a model as either selected or not selected. Just like regular models, this can be implemented either by implementing GtkSelectionModel directly or by wrapping a model with one of the GTK models provided for this purposes, such as GtkNoSelection or GtkSingleSelection.
trans-unit.target: 视图通过选择模型支持选择。选择模型是GListModel接口顶部的GtkSelectionModel接口的实现，该接口允许将模型中的每个项目标记为选中还是未选中。就像常规模型一样，这可以通过直接实现GtkSelectionModel或通过使用为此目的提供的其中一个GTK模型（例如GtkNoSelection或GtkSingleSelection）包装模型来实现。

trans-unit.source: Virtual function that moves the slider. Used for keybindings.

trans-unit.target: 在视觉上，底层状态由开关的浅色表示，而“活动”属性由开关的位置表示。

trans-unit.source: We add a new “Lines” menu item to the gears menu, which triggers the show-lines action:
trans-unit.target: 我们在gears菜单中添加了一个新的“ Lines”菜单项，它会触发show-lines操作：

trans-unit.source: We add a toggle button to the header bar, which can be used to slide out the search bar below the header bar.
trans-unit.target: 我们在头条上增加一个切换按钮,可以用来滑出头条下方的搜索栏。

trans-unit.source: We also need a function that counts the lines of the currently active tab, and updates the lines label. See the full source if you are interested in the details.
trans-unit.target: 我们还需要一个功能来对当前活动选项卡的行进行计数，并更新 lines 标签。如果您对详细信息感兴趣，请参见完整资料。

trans-unit.source: We are going to use GSettings to store our preferences. GSettings requires a schema that describes our settings:
trans-unit.target: 我们将使用GSettings来存储我们的偏好。GSettings需要一个模式来描述我们的设置。

trans-unit.source: We continue to flesh out the functionality of our application. For now, we add search. GTK supports this with GtkSearchEntry and GtkSearchBar. The search bar is a widget that can slide in from the top to present a search entry.
trans-unit.target: 我们继续充实我们应用程序的功能。现在,我们添加搜索功能。GTK通过GtkSearchEntry和GtkSearchBar来支持这个功能。搜索栏是一个小部件,它可以从顶部滑入以显示搜索条目.

trans-unit.source: We have various utility functions to parse and generate textual representations of keyboard accelerators.
trans-unit.target: 我们有各种实用函数来解析和生成键盘加速器的文本表示。

trans-unit.source: What degree of hinting to use; hintnone, hintslight, hintmedium, or hintfull.
trans-unit.target: 用什么程度的暗示;hintnone、hintslight、hintmedium或hinfull。

trans-unit.source: What our application looks like now:
trans-unit.target: 我们的应用现在是什么样子的。

trans-unit.source: What scope the shortcuts will be handled in.
trans-unit.target: 捷径将在什么范围内处理。

trans-unit.source: When ::use-alpha is TRUE, colors may have alpha (translucency) information. When it is FALSE, the GdkRGBA struct obtained via the “rgba” property will be forced to have alpha == 1.
trans-unit.target: 当:: use-alpha为 TRUE 时，颜色可能具有alpha（半透明）信息。当它为 FALSE 时，通过“ rgba”属性获得的GdkRGBA结构将被强制为alpha == 1。

trans-unit.source: When “empty” is TRUE, it gets the .empty style class.
trans-unit.target: 当“ empty”为 TRUE 时，它将获取.empty样式类。

trans-unit.source: When FALSE is returned, the caller should continue with keyboard navigation outside the widget, e.g. by calling gtk_widget_child_focus() on the widget’s toplevel.
trans-unit.target: 当返回 FALSE 时，调用者应继续在小部件外部进行键盘导航，例如，通过在小部件的顶层调用 gtk_widget_child_focus() 。

trans-unit.source: When TRUE is returned, stay in the widget, the failed keyboard navigation is OK and/or there is nowhere we can/should move the focus to.
trans-unit.target: 当返回 TRUE 时，留在窗口小部件中，失败的键盘导航就可以了，和/或没有地方可以/应该将焦点移到该位置。

trans-unit.source: When TRUE, keyboard navigation and other input-related errors will cause a beep. Since the error bell is implemented using gdk_surface_beep(), the windowing system may offer ways to configure the error bell in many ways, such as flashing the window or similar visual effects.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则键盘导航和其他与输入有关的错误将引起蜂鸣声。由于错误钟是使用 gdk_surface_beep() 实现的，因此窗口系统可以提供许多方式来配置错误钟，例如使窗口闪烁或类似的视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: When TRUE, pasted multi-line text is truncated to the first line.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则粘贴的多行文本将被截断到第一行。

trans-unit.source: When self is not playing or not playing from a file, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当 self 未播放或未从文件播放时，返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: When self is not playing or not playing from a stream, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当 self 未播放或未从流播放时，返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: When GDK threads are enabled, GtkApplication will acquire the GDK lock when invoking actions that arrive from other processes. The GDK lock is not touched for local action invocations. In order to have actions invoked in a predictable context it is therefore recommended that the GDK lock be held while invoking actions locally with g_action_group_activate_action(). The same applies to actions associated with GtkApplicationWindow and to the “activate” and “open” GApplication methods.
trans-unit.target: 启用GDK线程后，GtkApplication将在调用来自其他进程的操作时获取GDK锁。本地操作调用未触及GDK锁。为了在可预测的上下文中调用动作，因此建议在使用 g_action_group_activate_action() 在本地调用动作时，保持GDK锁。与GtkApplicationWindow和“激活”和“打开” GApplication方法关联的操作也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When GTK creates a GdkSurface, it connects to the “event” signal on it, which receives all of these input events. Surfaces have have signals and properties, e.g. to deal with window management related events.
trans-unit.target: 当GTK创建GdkSurface时，它将连接到其上的“事件”信号，该信号接收所有这些输入事件。表面具有信号和属性，例如用于处理与窗口管理相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: When a dialog is destroyed, it will break any references it holds to other objects. If it is visible it will be hidden and any underlying window system resources will be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对话框被销毁时,它将破坏它对其他对象的任何引用。如果它是可见的,它将被隐藏,任何底层窗口系统资源将被销毁。

trans-unit.source: When a parent widget sets the scrollable child widget’s adjustments, the widget should populate the adjustments’ “lower”, “upper”, “step-increment”, “page-increment” and “page-size” properties and connect to the “value-changed” signal.
trans-unit.target: 当父窗口小部件设置可滚动子窗口小部件的调整时，该窗口小部件应填充调整的“下”，“上”，“步长”，“页面增量”和“页面大小”属性，并连接到“值” -更改”信号。

trans-unit.source: When a toplevel container is shown, it is immediately realized and mapped; other shown widgets are realized and mapped when their toplevel container is realized and mapped.
trans-unit.target: 当一个toplevel容器被显示时,它就会立即被实现和映射;其他被显示的widgets在它们的toplevel容器被实现和映射时也会被实现和映射。

trans-unit.source: When a user interacts with an input device (e.g. moves a mouse or presses a key on the keyboard), GTK receives events from the windowing system. These are typically directed at a specific surface - for pointer events, the surface under the pointer (grabs complicate this), for keyboard events, the surface with the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 当用户与输入设备交互时(例如移动鼠标或按下键盘上的键),GTK从窗口系统接收事件。这些事件通常是指向一个特定的表面--对于指针事件,指针下的表面(抓取事件比较复杂),对于键盘事件,键盘焦点的表面.

trans-unit.source: When a user is providing input, an element containing a collection of values that could complete the provided input may be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提供输入时,可以显示一个包含可以完成所提供输入的值的集合的元素。

trans-unit.source: When a user is providing input, an element containing a collection of values that could complete the provided input may be displayed. If displayed, one value in the collection is automatically selected, and the text needed to complete the automatically selected value appears after the caret in the input.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提供输入时,可以显示一个包含可以完成所提供的输入的值集合的元素。如果显示,则自动选择该集合中的一个值,完成自动选择的值所需的文本出现在输入中的圆点之后。

trans-unit.source: When a user is providing input, text suggesting one way to complete the provided input may be dynamically inserted after the caret.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在提供输入时,可以在插字后面动态插入提示完成所提供输入的一种方式的文字。

trans-unit.source: When a widget receives a call to the snapshot function, it must send synthetic GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() calls to all children. This function provides a convenient way of doing this. A widget, when it receives a call to its GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() function, calls gtk_widget_snapshot_child() once for each child, passing in the snapshot the widget received.
trans-unit.target: 当小部件收到对快照函数的调用时，它必须将合成的 GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() 调用发送给所有子代。此功能提供了一种方便的方法。小部件在收到对其 GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() 函数的调用时，将为每个子级调用一次 gtk_widget_snapshot_child() ，并将接收到的小部件传递给 snapshot 。

trans-unit.source: When a widget with a connected action is activated, GTK finds the action to activate by walking up the widget hierarchy, looking for a matching action, ending up at the GtkApplication.
trans-unit.target: 当一个有连接动作的widget被激活时,GTK通过沿着widget层次结构向上走,寻找一个匹配的动作来找到要激活的动作,最后到达GtkApplication。

trans-unit.source: When an application can determine how much work needs to take place (e.g. read a fixed number of bytes from a file) and can monitor its progress, it can use the GtkProgressBar in percentage mode and the user sees a growing bar indicating the percentage of the work that has been completed. In this mode, the application is required to call gtk_progress_bar_set_fraction() periodically to update the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序可以确定需要进行多少工作（例如，从文件中读取固定数量的字节）并可以监视其进度时，它可以在百分比模式下使用GtkProgressBar，并且用户会看到一个不断增长的条形图，指示该百分比工作已经完成。在这种模式下，要求应用程序定期调用 gtk_progress_bar_set_fraction() 来更新进度栏。

trans-unit.source: When an application has no accurate way of knowing the amount of work to do, it can use the GtkProgressBar in activity mode, which shows activity by a block moving back and forth within the progress area. In this mode, the application is required to call gtk_progress_bar_pulse() periodically to update the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序无法准确知道要完成的工作量时，它可以在活动模式下使用GtkProgressBar，该模式通过在进度区域内来回移动的块来显示活动。在这种模式下，要求应用程序定期调用 gtk_progress_bar_pulse() 来更新进度条。

trans-unit.source: When an icon looked up in the icon theme was not available, the icon theme may use fallback icons - either those specified to gtk_icon_theme_lookup_icon() or the always-available "image-missing". The icon chosen is returned by this function.
trans-unit.target: 当在图标主题中查找的图标不可用时，该图标主题可以使用后备图标-指定给 gtk_icon_theme_lookup_icon() 的图标或始终可用的“缺少图像”图标。所选图标由该函数返回。

trans-unit.source: When any of the adjustments emits the “value-changed” signal, the scrollable widget should scroll its contents.
trans-unit.target: 当任何调整发出“值已更改”信号时，可滚动小部件应滚动其内容。

trans-unit.source: When any other cursor theme is used, GTK will prefer cursors from that theme, falling back to Windows cursors and built-in X cursors.
trans-unit.target: 当使用任何其他游标主题时,GTK会优先选择该主题的游标,退回到Windows游标和内置X游标。

trans-unit.source: When calling gtk_media_stream_seek() during an ongoing seek operation, the new seek will override any pending seek.
trans-unit.target: 在正在进行的搜索操作期间调用 gtk_media_stream_seek() 时，新搜索将覆盖任何未决搜索。

trans-unit.source: When circumstances require it, GtkStackSidebar adds the .needs-attention style class to the widgets representing the stack pages.
trans-unit.target: 当情况需要时,GtkStackSidebar会将.needs-attention样式类添加到代表堆栈页面的widgets中。

trans-unit.source: When circumstances require it, GtkStackSwitcher adds the .needs-attention style class to the widgets representing the stack pages.
trans-unit.target: 当情况需要时,GtkStackSwitcher会将.needs-attention样式类添加到代表堆栈页面的widgets中。

trans-unit.source: When compiling applications for Windows, you must declare signal callbacks with G_MODULE_EXPORT, or they will not be put in the symbol table. On Linux and Unices, this is not necessary; applications should instead be compiled with the -Wl,--export-dynamic CFLAGS, and linked against gmodule-export-2.0.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows下编译应用程序时,必须用G_MODULE_EXPORT声明信号回调,否则它们不会被放入符号表。在Linux和Unices上,这不是必须的;应用程序应该用-Wl,--export-dynamic CFLAGS来编译,并与gmodule-export-2.0链接。

trans-unit.source: When constructing a more complicated user interface, with dozens or hundreds of widgets, doing all the setup work in C code is cumbersome, and making changes becomes next to impossible.
trans-unit.target: 当构建一个比较复杂的用户界面,有几十个或几百个widget时,在C代码中完成所有的设置工作是很麻烦的,而且进行修改也变得几乎不可能。

trans-unit.source: When creating a GtkApplication, you need to pick an application identifier (a name) and pass it to gtk_application_new() as parameter. For this example org.gtk.example is used. For choosing an identifier for your application, see this guide. Lastly, gtk_application_new() takes GApplicationFlags as input for your application, if your application would have special needs.
trans-unit.target: 创建GtkApplication时，您需要选择一个应用程序标识符（名称），并将其作为参数传递给 gtk_application_new() 。对于此示例，使用 org.gtk.example 。有关为您的应用程序选择标识符的信息，请参阅本指南。最后，如果您的应用程序有特殊需要， gtk_application_new() 将GApplicationFlags作为应用程序的输入。

trans-unit.source: When creating an application, you’ll want to put more than one widget inside a window. When you do so, it becomes important to control how each widget is positioned and sized. This is where packing comes in.
trans-unit.target: 创建应用程序时，您需要在一个窗口中放置多个控件。当您这样做时，控制每个小部件的位置和大小变得很重要。这是包装的来源。

trans-unit.source: When creating custom widgets, following established patterns can help ensuring that the widgets work well for users of accessible technologies as well.
trans-unit.target: 在创建自定义小部件时,遵循既定的模式有助于确保小部件对无障碍技术的用户也能很好地工作。

trans-unit.source: When done with value , g_value_unset() needs to be called to free any allocated memory.
trans-unit.target: 使用 value 完成后，需要调用 g_value_unset() 释放所有分配的内存。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, “has-tooltip” will be set to TRUE and icon_view will connect a “query-tooltip” signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，“ has-tooltip”将设置为 TRUE ， icon_view 将连接“ query-tooltip”信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, “has-tooltip” will be set to TRUE and tree_view will connect a “query-tooltip” signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，“ has-tooltip”将设置为 TRUE ， tree_view 将连接“ query-tooltip”信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When gestures are grouped, the state of GdkEventSequences is kept in sync for all of those, so calling gtk_gesture_set_sequence_state(), on one will transfer the same value to the others.
trans-unit.target: 对手势进行分组后，GdkEventSequences的状态将对所有手势保持同步，因此在一个上调用 gtk_gesture_set_sequence_state() 会将一个相同的值传递给另一个。

trans-unit.source: When handling crossing events, this property is updated before “enter” but after “leave” is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 处理交叉事件时，此属性在“ enter”之前但在“ leave”发出之后进行更新。

trans-unit.source: When handling focus events, this property is updated before “enter” or “leave” are emitted.
trans-unit.target: 处理焦点事件时，会在发出“ enter”或“ leave”之前更新此属性。

trans-unit.source: When implementing the GObjectClass.set_property() and GObjectClass.get_property() virtual functions, you must use gtk_value_get_expression(), to retrieve the stored GtkExpression from the GValue container, and gtk_value_set_expression(), to store the GtkExpression into the GValue; for instance:
trans-unit.target: 在实现 GObjectClass.set_property() 和 GObjectClass.get_property() 虚拟函数时，必须使用 gtk_value_get_expression() 从GValue容器中检索存储的GtkExpression，以及 gtk_value_set_expression() 从GtkExpression存储到GValue中；例如：

trans-unit.source: When incremental filtering is enabled, the GtkFilterListModel will not run filters immediately, but will instead queue an idle handler that incrementally filters the items and adds them to the list. This of course means that items are not instantly added to the list, but only appear incrementally.
trans-unit.target: 当启用增量过滤时,GtkFilterListModel不会立即运行过滤器,而是会排队等待一个空闲处理程序来增量过滤项目并将其添加到列表中。当然,这意味着项目不会立即添加到列表中,而只是以增量方式出现。

trans-unit.source: When incremental sorting is enabled, the sortlistmodel will not do a complete sort immediately, but will instead queue an idle handler that incrementally sorts the items towards their correct position. This of course means that items do not instantly appear in the right place. It also means that the total sorting time is a lot slower.
trans-unit.target: 当启用增量排序时,排序模型不会立即进行完整的排序,而是会排队等待一个空闲的处理程序,以增量排序的方式将条目排到正确的位置。当然,这意味着项目不会立即出现在正确的位置上。这也意味着总的排序时间会慢很多。

trans-unit.source: When launching the application from sysprof, it will set the SYSPROF_TRACE_FD environment variable to point GTK at a file descriptor to write profiling data to.
trans-unit.target: 从sysprof启动应用程序时，它将设置 SYSPROF_TRACE_FD 环境变量以将GTK指向文件描述符以向其写入性能分析数据。

trans-unit.source: When looking for icons, GTK will search for a subdirectory of one or more of the directories in the search path with the same name as the icon theme containing an index.theme file. (Themes from multiple of the path elements are combined to allow themes to be extended by adding icons in the user’s home directory.)
trans-unit.target: 查找图标时，GTK将在搜索路径中搜索一个或多个目录的子目录，其名称与包含index.theme文件的图标主题同名。（来自多个路径元素的主题组合在一起，以允许通过在用户的主目录中添加图标来扩展主题。）

trans-unit.source: When monitoring is turned on after the initial creation of the directory list, the directory is reloaded to avoid missing files that appeared between the initial loading and when monitoring was turned on.
trans-unit.target: 在初始创建目录列表后开启监控时,会重新加载目录,以避免初始加载到开启监控时出现的文件丢失。

trans-unit.source: When necessary, GtkMountOperation shows dialogs to ask for passwords, questions or show processes blocking unmount.
trans-unit.target: 必要时，GtkMountOperation会显示对话框询问密码，问题或显示阻止卸载的进程。

trans-unit.source: When not set, the widget will inherit the font map from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 未设置时,小组件将从其父代继承字体映射。

trans-unit.source: When referring to actions on a GActionMap only the name of the action itself is used (ie: “quit”, not “app.quit”). The “app.quit” form is only used when referring to actions from places like a GMenu or GtkActionable widget where the scope of the action is not already known.
trans-unit.target: 当引用GActionMap上的动作时，仅使用动作本身的名称（即：“退出”，而不是“ app.quit”）。仅当从诸如GMenu或GtkActionable小部件之类的地方引用动作时，才使用“ app.quit”形式，这些动作的范围尚不清楚。

trans-unit.source: When refreshing your GtkSpinButton, the value is always displayed
trans-unit.target: 刷新GtkSpinButton时，始终显示该值

trans-unit.source: When refreshing your GtkSpinButton, the value is only displayed if it is valid within the bounds of the spin button's adjustment
trans-unit.target: 刷新GtkSpinButton时，仅在旋转按钮调整范围内有效时才显示该值

trans-unit.source: When requesting the size of a cell area one needs to calculate the size for a handful of rows, and this will be done differently by different layouting widgets. For instance a GtkTreeViewColumn always lines up the areas from top to bottom while a GtkIconView on the other hand might enforce that all areas received the same width and wrap the areas around, requesting height for more cell areas when allocated less width.
trans-unit.target: 当请求一个单元格区域的大小时，需要计算少量行的大小，这将通过不同的布局小部件来不同地完成。例如，GtkTreeViewColumn始终将区域从上到下排列，而另一方面，GtkIconView可能会强制所有区域接收相同的宽度并将其环绕，从而在分配较小的宽度时要求更多的单元格区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: When selecting or unselecting is supported by a model, the return values of the selection functions do *not* indicate if selection or unselection happened. They are only meant to indicate complete failure, like when this mode of selecting is not supported by the model.
trans-unit.target: 当模型支持选择或取消选择时,选择函数的返回值并不*表示是否发生了选择或取消选择。它们只是用来指示完全失败,比如当模型不支持这种选择模式时。

trans-unit.source: When set to NULL, the headerbar will display the title of the window it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 NULL 时，标题栏将显示其所在窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: When set to TRUE the margins of this tag are added to the margins of any other non-accumulative margins present. When set to FALSE the margins override one another (the default).
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 TRUE 时，此标签的边距将添加到存在的任何其他非累积边距的边距中。设置为 FALSE 时，边距会彼此覆盖（默认）。

trans-unit.source: When set to TRUE, other fonts will be substituted where the current font is missing glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 TRUE 时，如果当前字体缺少字形，则将替换其他字体。

trans-unit.source: When setting multiple adjustment properties via their individual setters, multiple “changed” signals will be emitted. However, since the emission of the “changed” signal is tied to the emission of the “notify” signals of the changed properties, it’s possible to compress the “changed” signals into one by calling g_object_freeze_notify() and g_object_thaw_notify() around the calls to the individual setters.
trans-unit.target: 通过其各自的设置器设置多个调整属性时，将发出多个“已更改”信号。但是，由于“已更改”信号的发射与“已更改”属性的“通知”信号的发射相关，因此可以通过在调用周围调用 g_object_freeze_notify() 和 g_object_thaw_notify() 将“已更改”信号压缩为一个信号给个别的二传手。

trans-unit.source: When styling a popover directly, the popover node should usually not have any background.
trans-unit.target: 在直接对弹出式节点进行样式设计时,弹出式节点通常不应该有任何背景。

trans-unit.source: When subclassing a widget that implements GtkCellLayout like GtkIconView or GtkComboBox, there are some considerations related to the fact that these widgets internally use a GtkCellArea. The cell area is exposed as a construct-only property by these widgets. This means that it is possible to e.g. do
trans-unit.target: 当对实现GtkCellLayout的小部件（如GtkIconView或GtkComboBox）进行子类化时，需要考虑一些与这些小部件内部使用GtkCellArea的事实有关的注意事项。这些小部件将单元格区域显示为仅构造属性。这意味着可以例如

trans-unit.source: When the box is using GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE, this signal will not give you the full picture of selection changes, and you should use the “selected-rows-changed” signal instead.
trans-unit.target: 当 box 使用GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE时，此信号将无法为您提供选择更改的完整信息，您应该使用“ selected-rows-changed”信号。

trans-unit.source: When the data is requested in the cause of a DND operation, it will be obtained from the content provider.
trans-unit.target: 在进行DND操作时,将从内容提供者处获得数据。

trans-unit.source: When the entry has a selection, it adds a subnode with the name selection.
trans-unit.target: 当条目有选择的时候,就会增加一个名称选择的子节点。

trans-unit.source: When the entry is in overwrite mode, it adds a subnode with the name block-cursor that determines how the block cursor is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当条目处于覆盖模式时,它增加了一个名称为block-cursor的子节点,该子节点决定了块状光标的绘制方式。

trans-unit.source: When the entry shows icons, it adds subnodes with the name image and the style class .left or .right, depending on where the icon appears.
trans-unit.target: 当条目显示图标时,它会根据图标出现的位置,添加带有名称图像和样式类.左或.右的子节点。

trans-unit.source: When the entry shows progress, it adds a subnode with the name progress. The node has the style class .pulse when the shown progress is pulsing.
trans-unit.target: 当条目显示进度时,会增加一个子节点,名称为进度。当显示的进度为脉冲时,该节点的样式类为.脉冲。

trans-unit.source: When the factory needs widgets created, it will create a GtkListItem and hand it to your code to set up a widget for. This list item will provide various properties with information about what item to display and provide you with some opportunities to configure its behavior. See the GtkListItem documentation for further details.
trans-unit.target: 当工厂需要创建小部件时，它将创建一个GtkListItem并将其交给您的代码来为其设置小部件。该列表项将为各种属性提供有关要显示的项目的信息，并为您提供一些配置其行为的机会。有关更多详细信息，请参见GtkListItem文档。

trans-unit.source: When the gesture enters recognition, or at a later point in time, the widget may choose to claim the touch sequences (individually or as a group), hence stopping event propagation after the event is run through every gesture in that widget and propagation phase. Anytime this happens, the touch sequences are cancelled downwards the propagation chain, to let these know that no further events will be sent.
trans-unit.target: 当手势进入识别时,或在稍后的时间点,小组件可能会选择索要触摸序列(单独或作为一组),因此在事件在该小组件和传播阶段的每个手势中运行后停止事件传播。任何时候发生这种情况,触摸序列都会在传播链中向下取消,以让这些知道不会再发送事件。

trans-unit.source: When the gesture starts to be recognized, GtkGesturePan will attempt to determine as early as possible whether the sequence is moving in the expected direction, and denying the sequence if this does not happen.
trans-unit.target: 当开始识别手势时，GtkGesturePan将尝试尽早确定序列是否沿预期方向移动，如果没有发生，则拒绝该序列。

trans-unit.source: When the horizontal scrollbar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当显示水平滚动条时。

trans-unit.source: When the new overall size of the context requires that the allocated size changes (or whenever this allocation changes at all), the variable row sizes need to be re-requested for every row.
trans-unit.target: 当上下文新的整体大小要求分配的大小发生变化时(或者每当这个分配发生变化时),需要为每一行重新请求可变的行大小。

trans-unit.source: When the org.freedesktop.portal.FileChooser portal is available on the session bus, it is used to bring up an out-of-process file chooser. Depending on the kind of session the application is running in, this may or may not be a GTK file chooser.
trans-unit.target: 当org.freedesktop.portal.FileChooser门户在会话总线上可用时,它被用来弹出一个进程外的文件选择器。根据应用程序运行的会话类型,它可能是也可能不是GTK文件选择器。

trans-unit.source: When the parent allocates space to the scrollable child widget, the widget should update the adjustments’ properties with new values.
trans-unit.target: 当父级为可滚动子级窗口小部件分配空间时，该窗口小部件应使用新值更新调整项的属性。

trans-unit.source: When the user is finished selecting files in a GtkFileChooser, your program can get the selected filenames as GFiles.
trans-unit.target: 当用户完成在GtkFileChooser中的文件选择后，您的程序可以将所选文件名作为GFiles获得。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a completion, the content of the entry is updated. By default, the content of the entry is replaced by the text column of the model, but this can be overridden by connecting to the “match-selected” signal and updating the entry in the signal handler. Note that you should return TRUE from the signal handler to suppress the default behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择完成时，条目的内容将更新。默认情况下，条目的内容被模型的文本列替换，但是可以通过连接到“匹配选择的”信号并更新信号处理程序中的条目来覆盖此内容。请注意，您应该从信号处理程序返回 TRUE ，以抑制默认行为。

trans-unit.source: When the vertical scrollbar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当显示垂直滚动条时。

trans-unit.source: When the widget is destroyed or no longer referenced elsewhere, it will be removed from the size group.
trans-unit.target: 当小组件被销毁或不再在其他地方引用时,它将从尺寸组中移除。

trans-unit.source: When this is called the dialog has been hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此功能时,对话框已被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: When this property is TRUE, the expander will resize the toplevel widget containing the expander upon expanding and collapsing.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性为 TRUE 时，扩展器将在扩展和折叠时调整包含扩展器的顶级窗口小部件的大小。

trans-unit.source: When touch is used and touch selection handles are shown, they are using CSS nodes with name cursor-handle. They get the .top or .bottom style class depending on where they are shown in relation to the selection. If there is just a single handle for the text cursor, it gets the style class .insertion-cursor.
trans-unit.target: 当使用触摸并显示触摸选择柄时,它们使用的是名称为cursor-handle的CSS节点。它们得到.top或.bottom样式类,这取决于它们与选择的关系的显示位置。如果文本光标只有一个句柄,它得到的样式类是.insertion-cursor。

trans-unit.source: When underlying GtkTreeModel data changes its important to reset the context if the content size is allowed to shrink. If the content size is only allowed to grow (this is usually an option for views rendering large data stores as a measure of optimization), then only the row that changed or was inserted needs to be (re)requested with gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_width().
trans-unit.target: 如果允许缩小内容大小，则当基础GtkTreeModel数据发生更改时，重要的是重置上下文。如果仅允许增加内容大小（这是呈现大型数据存储的视图的一种通常选择，这是一种优化措施），则仅需要使用 gtk_cell_area_get_preferred_width() 请求（更改或插入）行。

trans-unit.source: When using GtkApplication, it is not necessary to call gtk_init() manually. It is called as soon as the application gets registered as the primary instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用GtkApplication时，无需手动调用 gtk_init() 。一旦将应用程序注册为主要实例，就会调用它。

trans-unit.source: When using GtkTreeModelFilter, it is important to realize that GtkTreeModelFilter maintains an internal cache of all nodes which are visible in its clients. The cache is likely to be a subtree of the tree exposed by the child model. GtkTreeModelFilter will not cache the entire child model when unnecessary to not compromise the caching mechanism that is exposed by the reference counting scheme. If the child model implements reference counting, unnecessary signals may not be emitted because of reference counting rule 3, see the GtkTreeModel documentation. (Note that e.g. GtkTreeStore does not implement reference counting and will always emit all signals, even when the receiving node is not visible).
trans-unit.target: 使用GtkTreeModelFilter时，重要的是要意识到GtkTreeModelFilter维护其客户端中可见的所有节点的内部缓存。缓存可能是子模型公开的树的子树。不必要时，GtkTreeModelFilter将不会缓存整个子模型，而不会损害参考计数方案公开的缓存机制。如果子模型实现了引用计数，则由于引用计数规则3，可能不会发出不必要的信号，请参阅GtkTreeModel文档。 （请注意，例如，即使当接收节点不可见时，GtkTreeStore也不会实现引用计数，并且将始终发出所有信号）。

trans-unit.source: When using GtkApplication, the main() function can be very simple. We just call g_application_run() and give it an instance of our application class.
trans-unit.target: 使用GtkApplication时， main() 函数可能非常简单。我们只调用 g_application_run() 并为其提供应用程序类的实例。

trans-unit.source: When using an entry for passwords and other sensitive information, it can be put into “password mode” using gtk_entry_set_visibility(). In this mode, entered text is displayed using a “invisible” character. By default, GTK picks the best invisible character that is available in the current font, but it can be changed with gtk_entry_set_invisible_char().
trans-unit.target: 在使用密码和其他敏感信息条目时，可以使用 gtk_entry_set_visibility() 将其置于“密码模式” 。在此模式下，输入的文本使用“不可见”字符显示。默认情况下，GTK选择当前字体中可用的最佳不可见字符，但可以使用 gtk_entry_set_invisible_char() 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: When using an entry for passwords and other sensitive information, it can be put into “password mode” using gtk_text_set_visibility(). In this mode, entered text is displayed using a “invisible” character. By default, GTK picks the best invisible character that is available in the current font, but it can be changed with gtk_text_set_invisible_char().
trans-unit.target: 当使用密码和其他敏感信息的条目时，可以使用 gtk_text_set_visibility() 将其置于“密码模式” 。在此模式下，输入的文本使用“不可见”字符显示。默认情况下，GTK会选择当前字体中可用的最佳不可见字符，但可以使用 gtk_text_set_invisible_char() 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: When using gtk4-broadwayd, specify the display number to use, prefixed with a colon, similar to X. The default display number is 0.
trans-unit.target: 当使用gtk4-broadwayd时,指定要使用的显示编号,用冒号前缀,类似于X,默认显示编号为0。

trans-unit.source: When widgets receive an event, they frequently emit one or more “signals”. Signals notify your program that "something interesting happened" by invoking functions you’ve connected to the signal with g_signal_connect(). Functions connected to a signal are often called “callbacks”.
trans-unit.target: 当小部件接收到事件时，它们经常发出一个或多个“信号”。信号通过调用已使用 g_signal_connect() 连接到信号的函数来通知程序“发生了一些有趣的事情” 。连接到信号的功能通常称为“回调”。

trans-unit.source: When working with reference counting, the following rules must be taken into account:
trans-unit.target: 在使用参考计数时,必须考虑到以下规则。

trans-unit.source: When you close the window, by for example pressing the X, the g_application_run() call returns with a number which is saved inside an integer variable named status. Afterwards, the GtkApplication object is freed from memory with g_object_unref(). Finally the status integer is returned and the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭窗口时，例如按X， g_application_run() 调用返回一个数字，该数字保存在名为 status 的整数变量中。之后，使用 g_object_unref() 从内存中释放GtkApplication对象。最后，返回状态整数，并退出应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When you need a tooltip with a little more fancy contents, like adding an image, or you want the tooltip to have different contents per GtkTreeView row or cell, you will have to do a little more work:
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要一个带有更多精美内容的工具提示（例如添加图像），或者您希望该工具提示的每个GtkTreeView行或单元格具有不同的内容，则您将需要做更多的工作：

trans-unit.source: When your callbacks are invoked, you would typically take some action - for example, when an Open button is clicked you might display a GtkFileChooserDialog. After a callback finishes, GTK will return to the main loop and await more user input.
trans-unit.target: 调用回调时，通常会采取一些措施-例如，当单击“打开”按钮时，可能会显示GtkFileChooserDialog。回调完成后，GTK将返回主循环并等待更多用户输入。

trans-unit.source: When your filter blocks the UI while filtering, you might consider turning this on. Depending on your model and filters, this may become interesting around 10,000 to 100,000 items.
trans-unit.target: 当你的过滤器在过滤时阻止了UI,你可以考虑打开这个功能。根据您的模型和过滤器,这可能会在10,000到100,000个项目左右变得有趣。

trans-unit.source: When your filter blocks the UI while sorting, you might consider turning this on. Depending on your model and sorters, this may become interesting around 10,000 to 100,000 items.
trans-unit.target: 当你的过滤器在排序时阻挡了UI,你可以考虑打开这个功能。根据您的模型和分类器,这可能会在10,000到100,000个项目时变得有趣。

trans-unit.source: Whenever drawing_area needs to redraw, this function will be called.
trans-unit.target: 每当 drawing_area 需要重绘时，将调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Whenever row changes or which row is before row changes this is called, which lets you update the header on row . You may remove or set a new one via gtk_list_box_row_set_header() or just change the state of the current header widget.
trans-unit.target: 每当 row 这行更改或前 row 改变了这一叫法，它可以让你更新的标题 row 。您可以通过 gtk_list_box_row_set_header() 删除或设置一个新的标题，或者仅更改当前标题小部件的状态。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a container has some form of natural row it may align children in that row along a common typographical baseline. If the amount of vertical space in the row is taller than the total requested height of the baseline-aligned children then it can use a GtkBaselinePosition to select where to put the baseline inside the extra available space.
trans-unit.target: 每当容器具有某种形式的自然行时，它都可以沿着共同的印刷基线将该行中的子项对齐。如果行中的垂直空间的数量大于基线对齐的子代要求的总高度，则可以使用GtkBaselinePosition选择将基线放置在额外可用空间中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Whenever input interaction happens, a single event may trigger a cascade of GtkGestures, both across the parents of the widget receiving the event and in parallel within an individual widget. It is a responsibility of the widgets using those gestures to set the state of touch sequences accordingly in order to enable cooperation of gestures around the GdkEventSequences triggering those.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生输入交互时,一个事件可能会触发一连串的 GtkGestures,这些 GtkGestures 既包括接收事件的 widget 的父代,也包括单个 widget 内的并行。使用这些手势的小组件有责任相应地设置触摸序列的状态,以便使手势能够围绕触发这些手势的 GdkEventSequences 进行合作。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the default handler returns TRUE, it also calls gtk_widget_error_bell() to notify the user of the failed keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: 每当默认处理程序返回 TRUE 时，它还会调用 gtk_widget_error_bell() 来通知用户键盘导航失败。

trans-unit.source: Where the contents are located with respect to the scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: 内容相对于滚动条的位置。

trans-unit.source: Whether 'focus rectangles' are currently visible in this window.
trans-unit.target: '焦点矩形'当前是否在该窗口中可见。

trans-unit.source: Whether area was successfully activated.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 area 被成功激活。

trans-unit.source: Whether GTK should keep track of items inside the recently used resources list. If set to FALSE, the list will always be empty.
trans-unit.target: GTK是否应跟踪最近使用的资源列表中的项目。如果设置为 FALSE ，则列表将始终为空。

trans-unit.source: Whether GTK should make sure that text can be navigated with a caret, even if it is not editable. This is useful when using a screen reader.
trans-unit.target: GTK 是否应该确保文本可以用斜线来导航,即使它是不可编辑的.这在使用屏幕阅读器时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Whether Tab will result in a tab character being entered.
trans-unit.target: Tab是否会导致输入Tab字符。

trans-unit.source: Whether a file chooser not in GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN mode will offer the user to create new folders.
trans-unit.target: 文件选择器是否不在 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN 模式下将为用户提供创建新文件夹的方法。

trans-unit.source: Whether a fill level indicator graphics is shown.
trans-unit.target: 是否显示填充水平指示图形。

trans-unit.source: Whether a middle click on a mouse should paste the 'PRIMARY' clipboard content at the cursor location.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标中间点击是否应该将 "primary "剪贴板内容粘贴在光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Whether a spin button should wrap upon reaching its limits.
trans-unit.target: 旋转按钮是否应该在达到极限时进行包装。

trans-unit.source: Whether all cells should be draw as sensitive for this view regardless of the actual cell properties (used to make menus with submenus appear sensitive when the items in submenus might be insensitive).
trans-unit.target: 无论实际的单元格属性如何,是否所有的单元格都应该作为敏感单元格绘制在该视图中(当子菜单中的项目可能不敏感时,用于使带有子菜单的菜单显得敏感)。

trans-unit.source: Whether all the columns in the grid have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 网格中的所有列是否具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Whether all the rows in the grid have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 网格中所有的行是否有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: Whether breaks are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 是否允许休息。

trans-unit.source: Whether builtin GTK dialogs such as the file chooser, the color chooser or the font chooser will use a header bar at the top to show action widgets, or an action area at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 无论是内置的GTK对话框,如文件选择器、颜色选择器还是字体选择器,都会在顶部使用头条来显示动作部件,或者在底部使用动作区域。

trans-unit.source: Whether buttons in dialogs should use the alternative button order.
trans-unit.target: 对话框中的按钮是否应该使用备选按钮顺序。

trans-unit.source: Whether columns are reorderable
trans-unit.target: 栏目是否可以重新排序

trans-unit.source: Whether entered text overwrites existing contents.
trans-unit.target: 输入的文字是否会覆盖现有内容。

trans-unit.source: Whether erroneous values are automatically changed to a spin button’s nearest step increment.
trans-unit.target: 错误值是否自动更改为旋转按钮最接近的步长增量。

trans-unit.source: Whether focus is contain in the controllers widget. See See “is-focus” for whether the focus is in the widget itself or inside a descendent.
trans-unit.target: 控制器小部件中是否包含焦点。有关焦点是在小部件本身中还是在子孙内部，请参见“ is-focus”。

trans-unit.source: Whether focus is in the controllers widget itself, opposed to in a descendent widget. See also “contains-focus”.
trans-unit.target: 焦点是否在控制器窗口小部件本身中，而不是在后代窗口小部件中。另请参阅“包含焦点”。

trans-unit.source: Whether font fallback is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用字体回退。

trans-unit.source: Whether grid lines should be drawn in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该在树状视图中绘制网格线。

trans-unit.source: Whether kinetic scrolling is enabled or not. Kinetic scrolling only applies to devices with source GDK_SOURCE_TOUCHSCREEN.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用动态滚动。动态滚动仅适用于源 GDK_SOURCE_TOUCHSCREEN 的设备。

trans-unit.source: Whether menu items should have visible accelerators which can be activated.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项是否应该有可见的加速器,可以被激活。

trans-unit.source: Whether mnemonics are currently visible in this popover.
trans-unit.target: 当前在这个弹出式菜单中是否能看到口诀。

trans-unit.source: Whether mnemonics are currently visible in this window.
trans-unit.target: 当前在这个窗口中是否能看到口诀。

trans-unit.source: Whether non-numeric characters should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该忽略非数字字符。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the size should smoothly change when changing between differently sized children.
trans-unit.target: 在不同体型的孩子之间转换时,大小是否应该平稳变化。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the transition is currently running.
trans-unit.target: 目前是否正在进行过渡。

trans-unit.source: Whether overlay scrolling is enabled or not. If it is, the scrollbars are only added as traditional widgets when a mouse is present. Otherwise, they are overlaid on top of the content, as narrow indicators.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用了覆盖式滚动。如果启用,则滚动条只在有鼠标时作为传统部件添加。否则,它们将作为窄指示器重叠在内容之上。

trans-unit.source: Whether scrolled windows may use overlaid scrolling indicators. If this is set to FALSE, scrolled windows will have permanent scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: 滚动窗口是否可以使用重叠的滚动指示器。如果将其设置为 FALSE ，则滚动窗口将具有永久滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Whether tabs should be shown.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该显示标签。

trans-unit.source: Whether the GtkSwitch widget is in its on or off state.
trans-unit.target: 无论GtkSwitch部件处于开启或关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: Whether the GtkPicture will render its contents trying to preserve the aspect ratio of the contents.
trans-unit.target: GtkPicture是否会尝试保留内容的纵横比来渲染其内容。

trans-unit.source: Whether the application has a selection.
trans-unit.target: 申请是否有选择。

trans-unit.source: Whether the application prefers to use a dark theme. If a GTK theme includes a dark variant, it will be used instead of the configured theme.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序是否喜欢使用深色主题。如果一个GTK主题包含一个深色的变体,它将被用来代替配置的主题。

trans-unit.source: Whether the audio stream should be muted.
trans-unit.target: 音频流是否应该静音。

trans-unit.source: Whether the background color fills the entire line height or only the height of the tagged characters.
trans-unit.target: 背景色是填满整个行高还是只填满标记字符的高度。

trans-unit.source: Whether the border should be shown.
trans-unit.target: 是否要显示边框。

trans-unit.source: Whether the box layout should distribute the available space homogeneously among the children of the widget using it as a layout manager.
trans-unit.target: 盒式布局是否应将可用空间均匀地分配给使用它作为布局管理器的小组件的子节点。

trans-unit.source: Whether the buffer has some text currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区当前是否有一些文字被选中。

trans-unit.source: Whether the button has a frame.
trans-unit.target: 按钮是否有框架。

trans-unit.source: Whether the calendar shows day names.
trans-unit.target: 日历是否显示日名。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cell background color is set.
trans-unit.target: 是否设置了单元格背景色。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cell renderer is currently in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器当前是否处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cell renderer should be aligned in adjacent rows.
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器是否应该在相邻行中对齐。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cell renderer should receive extra space when the area receives more than its natural size.
trans-unit.target: 当区域接收到的空间超过其自然大小时,单元格渲染器是否应该获得额外的空间。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cell renderer should require the same size for all rows for which it was requested.
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器是否应该要求所有行的大小都相同。

trans-unit.source: Whether the child is revealed and the animation target reached.
trans-unit.target: 是否显露孩子,达到动画目标。

trans-unit.source: Whether the child should be accessible as an “internal-child” when this class is used in GtkBuilder XML
trans-unit.target: 在GtkBuilder XML中使用此类时，是否应该将子级作为“内部子级”访问

trans-unit.source: Whether the child should be clipped to fit the parent's size.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该根据父母的尺寸给孩子剪掉。

trans-unit.source: Whether the child size should contribute to the GtkOverlayLayout's measurement.
trans-unit.target: 子项大小是否应有助于GtkOverlayLayout的度量。

trans-unit.source: Whether the child’s tab should fill the allocated area.
trans-unit.target: 孩子的选项卡是否应填充分配的区域。

trans-unit.source: Whether the children should all be the same size.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们是否应该都一样大。

trans-unit.source: Whether the column can be reordered around the headers.
trans-unit.target: 栏目是否可以围绕标题重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Whether the combo box has an entry.
trans-unit.target: 组合框是否有条目。

trans-unit.source: Whether the combo boxes dropdown is popped up. Note that this property is mainly useful, because it allows you to connect to notify::popup-shown.
trans-unit.target: 组合框下拉是否被弹出。请注意,这个属性主要是有用的,因为它允许你连接到notify::popup-shown。

trans-unit.source: Whether the container should reveal the child.
trans-unit.target: 容器是否应该露出孩子。

trans-unit.source: Whether the current value is displayed as a string next to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 当前的数值是否以字符串的形式显示在滑块旁边。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cursor should blink.
trans-unit.target: 光标是否应该闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Whether the dialog is modal.
trans-unit.target: 对话框是否为模态。

trans-unit.source: Whether the dialog should be modal.
trans-unit.target: 对话框是否应该是模式化的。

trans-unit.source: Whether the dialog supports selection.
trans-unit.target: 对话框是否支持选择。

trans-unit.source: Whether the drop data should be preloaded when the pointer is only hovering over the widget but has not been released.
trans-unit.target: 当指针仅悬停在小组件上但尚未释放时,是否应预载投放数据。

trans-unit.source: Whether the dropdown button is sensitive when the model is empty.
trans-unit.target: 当模型为空时,下拉按钮是否敏感。

trans-unit.source: Whether the entry contents can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 是否可以对条目内容进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Whether the entry should grow and shrink with the content.
trans-unit.target: 条目是否应该随着内容的增长和缩小。

trans-unit.source: Whether the event triggered the shortcut
trans-unit.target: 该事件是否触发了快捷方式

trans-unit.source: Whether the expander has been opened to reveal the child widget.
trans-unit.target: 是否已打开展开器以显示子部件。

trans-unit.source: Whether the fill level restricts slider movement.
trans-unit.target: 填充水平是否限制了滑块的移动。

trans-unit.source: Whether the gesture handles only touch events.
trans-unit.target: 手势是否只处理触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: Whether the gesture is exclusive
trans-unit.target: 姿态是否专一

trans-unit.source: Whether the gesture is exclusive. Exclusive gestures only listen to pointer and pointer emulated events.
trans-unit.target: 该手势是否为独占式手势。独占手势只监听指针和指针仿真事件。

trans-unit.source: Whether the header can be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 头部是否可以点击。

trans-unit.source: Whether the headers are visible or not.
trans-unit.target: 标题是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Whether the icon displayed in the GtkImage will use standard icon names fallback. The value of this property is only relevant for images of type GTK_IMAGE_ICON_NAME and GTK_IMAGE_GICON.
trans-unit.target: GtkImage中显示的图标是否将使用标准图标名称回退。此属性的值仅与 GTK_IMAGE_ICON_NAME 和 GTK_IMAGE_GICON 类型的图像有关。

trans-unit.source: Whether the invisible char has been set for the GtkEntry.
trans-unit.target: 是否已为GtkEntry设置了不可见的字符。

trans-unit.source: Whether the invisible char has been set for the GtkText.
trans-unit.target: 是否已为GtkText设置了不可见的字符。

trans-unit.source: Whether the label is in single line mode. In single line mode, the height of the label does not depend on the actual text, it is always set to ascent + descent of the font. This can be an advantage in situations where resizing the label because of text changes would be distracting, e.g. in a statusbar.
trans-unit.target: 标签是否处于单行模式。在单行模式下,标签的高度不取决于实际文本,它总是设置为字体的上升+下降。这在因文字变化而调整标签大小会使人分心的情况下是一个优势,例如在状态栏中。

trans-unit.source: Whether the label text can be selected with the mouse.

trans-unit.source: Whether the make changes permanent

trans-unit.source: Whether the margins accumulate or override each other.

trans-unit.source: Whether the mark has left gravity. When text is inserted at the mark’s current location, if the mark has left gravity it will be moved to the left of the newly-inserted text, otherwise to the right.
trans-unit.target: 标记是否已离开重力。在标记的当前位置插入文本时，如果标记具有重力，它将被移至新插入的文本的左侧，否则移至右侧。
